ns1:info.ns1:senderName: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
ns1:info.ns1:headline: Cases of Vibrio vulnificus identified among Hurrican Katrina evacuees
ns1:info.ns1:description: To date, seven people in the area effected by Hurricane Katrina have been reported ill from the bacterial disease Vibrio vulnificus.
ns1:info.ns1:instruction: Please distribute to health providers and officials within your jurisdiction as deemed appropriate
